title: Pathological Classification of Oligodendroglioma: Digital Image Analysis and Machine Learning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Pathology and Digital Image Analysis
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training using smartphone-based VR simulations in constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Classify three types of gliomas (diffuse astrocytoma, anaplastic astrocytoma, glioblastoma) in digital pathology images with over 85% accuracy.
Interpret patch-level analysis results from the ResNet-50 model to quantify tumor characteristics (cell density, nuclear morphological features).
Compare nuclear morphological indicators (axis ratio, circularity, entropy, etc.) extracted via the HTC framework to evaluate diagnostic reliability.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
